title: Project Manager
description: We are seeking an experienced and proactive Project Manager to lead and coordinate projects from initiation to completion. In this role, you will be responsible for planning, executing, and closing projects while ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, clients, and stakeholders to secure alignment and achieve business goals.
requirements:
• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in project management, business, IT, engineering, or a related field

  • 3+ years of project management experience (industry-specific experience is a plus)

  • Strong organizational and leadership skills

  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities

  • Proficiency with project management software (e.g., MS Project, Jira, Asana, Trello)

  • Ability to manage multiple tasks and adapt to changing priorities

  • Project Management certifications (PMP, PRINCE2, Agile/Scrum) are an advantage
responsibilities:
• Plan, manage, and monitor projects from initiation to delivery

  • Coordinate internal teams, external partners, and stakeholders

  • Develop and maintain project plans, timelines, and budgets

  • Identify and manage risks while ensuring steady progress

  • Provide regular status reports to management and stakeholders
benefits:
• Competitive salary and employment package

  • Health insurance and pension scheme

  • Opportunities for professional development and training

  • Flexible working hours and possibility of hybrid work

  • Supportive, collaborative, and innovative work environment

  • Chance to be part of impactful projects with visible results

title: Project Manager
description:
We are seeking an experienced and proactive Project Manager to lead and coordinate projects from initiation to completion. In this role, you will be responsible for planning, executing, and closing projects while ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, clients, and stakeholders to secure alignment and achieve business goals.

Key tasks include:

  • Developing detailed project plans, timelines, and budgets

  • Managing project scope, goals, and deliverables

  • Coordinating internal resources and third parties/vendors

  • Monitoring progress and reporting on project status

  • Identifying risks, resolving issues, and ensuring project quality
requirements:
• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in project management, business, IT, engineering, or a related field

  • 3+ years of project management experience (industry-specific experience is a plus)

  • Strong organizational and leadership skills

  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities

  • Proficiency with project management software (e.g., MS Project, Jira, Asana, Trello)

  • Ability to manage multiple tasks and adapt to changing priorities

  • Project Management certifications (PMP, PRINCE2, Agile/Scrum) are an advantage
responsibilities:
• Plan, manage, and monitor projects from initiation to delivery

  • Coordinate internal teams, external partners, and stakeholders

  • Develop and maintain project plans, timelines, and budgets

  • Identify and manage risks while ensuring steady progress

  • Provide regular status reports to management and stakeholders
benefits:
• Competitive salary and employment package

  • Health insurance and pension scheme

  • Opportunities for professional development and training

  • Flexible working hours and possibility of hybrid work

  • Supportive, collaborative, and innovative work environment

  • Chance to be part of impactful projects with visible results
